questions.question:
TOPIC 4.2 Monitor and optimize infrastructure and costs.

A healthcare company is developing an ML model to improve the efficiency of physician note taking. The deep learning model summarizes notes from patientsâ€™ visits and automatically generates a list of action items that the patients can take to improve their health. The company needs to determine which Amazon EC2 instance type the company should use to host the model for inference.

Which EC2 instance type should the company use?
options:
A
Compute optimized group of ML instances

B
Accelerated computing group of ML instances

C
General purpose group of ML instances

D
Storage optimized group of ML instances
correct_answers:
B
Accelerated computing group of ML instances
